member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Actions.FailingAction
member.summary: Defines a task action always fails.
member.remarks: This type is for testing purposes only. The configuration string options are: : indicates whether the action should throw an exception (default is false).

member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that indicates whether the action should throw an exception.

member.summary: Executes the action.
member.returns: The that describes the asynchronous operation. The task action result, which indicates how the trigger should proceed executing the task.

member.summary: Defines the outcome of a task action.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Actions.TaskActionOutcome.Continue
member.summary: Indicates that the action succeeded and the task execution (by executing the other actions) may continue.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Actions.TaskActionOutcome.Failing
member.summary: Indicates that the action failed but the task execution may be retried.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Actions.TaskActionOutcome.Failed
member.summary: Indicates that the action failed and the task execution should not be retried.

member.summary: Creates an instance of that indicates that the action succeeded and the task execution (by executing the other actions) may continue.

member.summary: Creates an instance of that indicates that the action failed but the task execution may be retried.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService
member.summary: The taskbox is a multi-task processing engine that allows enqueuing tasks for execution in the background (possibly out-of-process) by a cluster of instances that support load-balancing.
member.remarks: This service allows interacting with the current taskbox instance, the one running in the host that holds the service, and obtaining information about any instance, worker or tasks within the taskbox cluster. Multiple hosts will form a taskbox cluster if they all configure this service against the same database (used to coordinate all the instances).

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.InstanceStarted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current taskbox instance is started.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.StartInstanceAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts the current taskbox instance.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.
member.remarks: The host running this service also runs the current taskbox instance.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.StopInstanceAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Stops the current taskbox instance.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.
member.remarks: The host running this service also runs the current taskbox instance.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.GetInstanceAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves information about the specified taskbox instance.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The taskbox instance information.
member.exception: Raised if the taskbox instance does not exist ().

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.GetInstancesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves information about the taskbox instances that are part of the taskbox cluster.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. An enumerable for the taskbox instances that are part of the taskbox cluster.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.GetWorkerAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves information about the specified taskbox worker.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The taskbox worker information.
member.exception: Raised if the task does not exist ().

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.GetWorkersAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves information about the taskbox workers that are part of the taskbox cluster (all instances).
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. An enumerable for the taskbox workers that are part of the taskbox cluster (all instances).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.ExecuteTaskAsync(Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskConfig,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Adds the specified task to the taskbox cluster to be executed.
member.param: The configuration of the task that should be executed.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The task information.
member.remarks: The task will be evaluated, as soon as a taskbox worker becomes available, to determine when and how it should be executed (according to its trigger and actions).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.CancelTaskAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Cancels the execution of the specified task (if it is not executing or was already executed).
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The task information.
member.exception: Raised if the task cannot be canceled (, , ).

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.GetTaskAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves information about the specified task.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The task information.
member.exception: Raised if the task does not exist ().

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskboxService.GetTasksAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves information about the tasks that are available in the taskbox cluster (all instances).
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. An enumerable for the tasks that are available in the taskbox cluster (all instances).

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskExecutionContext
member.summary: Defines the execution context of a task. This context is used by triggers and actions during the task execution and it includes information about the task, means to invoke actions and a property bag to store data shared by the trigger and the actions. The context also provides access to the service provider to resolve services and to the taskbox service (to execute other tasks, for example).

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskExecutionContext.ApplicationServices
member.summary: Gets the application services.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskExecutionContext.Taskbox
member.summary: Gets a reference to the taskbox service.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskExecutionContext.Task
member.summary: Gets information about the task that is being executed.
member.remarks: Any change performed on this information by the trigger or the actions will have no effect on the actual task being executed by the taskbox.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskExecutionContext.ConfigStr
member.summary: Gets the configuration string of the task component being executed.
member.remarks: The trigger and actions should use this value to access its configuration string as set originally by the caller when creating the task. This means that the value will be either or depending on the task component being invoked.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskExecutionContext.Properties
member.summary: Gets or sets a dictionary that may be used to share data between the trigger and the actions. The dictionary is initialized with the properties set (if any) by the caller in the task configuration when the task is executed.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskExecutionContext.ExecuteActionsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Instantiates the task actions and executes them one at a time.
member.returns: The that describes the asynchronous operation. The trigger result, indicating to the taskbox whether the task execution was completed, canceled, delayed, failing or failed.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskState.New
member.summary: The task is new and still was not queued to be executed.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskState.Queued
member.summary: The task is queued for execution.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskState.Executing
member.summary: The task is executing.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskState.Completed
member.summary: The task is completed and executed successfully.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskState.Failing
member.summary: The task execution failed but it may be retried.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskState.Failed
member.summary: The task could not be executed.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskState.Delayed
member.summary: The task execution was delayed.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskState.Aborted
member.summary: The task execution was aborted while ongoing.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskState.Canceled
member.summary: The task was canceled before being executed.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskTriggerConfig.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.TaskTriggerConfig.Clone
member.summary: Clones this instance.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ContinuousTrigger
member.summary: Defines a trigger that executes the task actions continuously for a number of times, waiting between executions.
member.remarks: The configuration string options are: : the number of times that the trigger should execute the task actions (default is 10). : the time to wait (in seconds) before consecutive executions of the task actions (default is 1).

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ContinuousTrigger.Count
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that specifies the number of times that the trigger should execute the task actions.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ContinuousTrigger.WaitTimeSecs
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that specifies the time to wait (in seconds) before consecutive executions of the task actions.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ContinuousTrigger.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ContinuousTrigger})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.DelayingTrigger
member.summary: Defines a trigger that always delays the first execution of the task actions by a period of time.
member.remarks: The configuration string options are: : the moment to when the task should be delayed (if not set, will be used). : the amount of time (in seconds) that the task should be delayed (default is 1).

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.DelayingTrigger.Next
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that specifies the moment to when the task should be delayed.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.DelayingTrigger.DelaySecs
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that specifies the amount of time (in seconds) that the task should be delayed.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.DelayingTrigger.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.DelayingTrigger})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ImmediateTrigger
member.summary: Defines a trigger that executes the task actions immediately.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ImmediateTrigger.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ImmediateTrigger})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ITaskTrigger
member.summary: Defines the interface of a task trigger. A trigger is responsible for determining when a task should be executed and then execute the task actions.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ITaskTrigger.ExecuteAsync(Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.ITaskExecutionContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Triggers the execution of a task.
member.returns: The that describes the asynchronous operation. The trigger result, indicating to the taskbox whether the task execution was completed, canceled, delayed, failing or failed.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.MessageBusTrigger
member.summary: Defines a trigger that executes the task actions when a new message is received from a message bus queue or topic.
member.remarks: The configuration string options are: : the message bus queue name (if not set, will be used). : the message bus topic name. : the message bus topic name. : specifies the maximum number of concurrent calls to the message handler the subscriber should initiate (default is set by the message bus configuration). : indicates whether the task execution should fail if there is an error (exception) while receiving messages (default is true).

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.MessageBusTrigger.Queue
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that specifies the message bus queue name.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.MessageBusTrigger.Topic
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that specifies the message bus topic name.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.MessageBusTrigger.Subscription
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that specifies the message bus subscription name.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.MessageBusTrigger.MaxConcurrentCalls
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that specifies the maximum number of concurrent calls to the message handler the subscriber should initiate.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.MessageBusTrigger.FailOnError
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that indicates whether the task execution should fail if there is an error (exception) while receiving messages.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.MessageBusTrigger.OnSubscriberStarted
member.summary: Gets or sets that will be invoked immediately after the subscriber is started.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.MessageBusTrigger.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.MessageBusTrigger})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ScheduleTrigger
member.summary: Defines a trigger that executes the task actions according to a schedule defined by a CRON expression.
member.remarks: The configuration string options are: : the CRON expression (required).

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ScheduleTrigger.Cron
member.summary: The name of the configuration string key that specifies the CRON expression.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ScheduleTrigger.IncludeSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the CRON expressions can include seconds.
member.remarks: Keep in mind that the taskbox is not designed to execute tasks so frequently that having tasks executing every second would be possible.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ScheduleTrigger.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.ScheduleTrigger})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerOutcome
member.summary: Defines the outcome of a task trigger.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerOutcome.Unspecified
member.summary: Indicates that the task trigger was not invoked.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerOutcome.Completed
member.summary: Indicates that the task trigger completed the execution of the task.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerOutcome.Canceled
member.summary: Indicates that the task trigger canceled the execution of the task.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerOutcome.Delayed
member.summary: Indicates that the task execution should be delayed.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerOutcome.Failing
member.summary: Indicates that the task execution failed but may be retried.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerOutcome.Failed
member.summary: Indicates that the task execution failed and should not be retried.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerResult
member.summary: Describes the result of executing a task trigger.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerResult.Result
member.summary: Gets the result.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerResult.Reason
member.summary: Gets an optional reason that describes the result.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerResult.Delay
member.summary: Gets an optional moment in time when the task should be executed again.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerResult.Completed
member.summary: Creates an instance of that indicates that the task trigger completed the execution of the task.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerResult.Delayed(System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of that indicates that the task execution should be delayed.
member.param: The moment when the task should be executed again.
The reason that describes the result.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerResult.Failing(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of that indicates that the task execution failed but may be retried.
member.param: The reason that describes the result.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerResult.Failed(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of that indicates that the task execution failed and should not be retried.
member.param: The reason that describes the result.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.Triggers.TaskTriggerResult.Canceled(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of that indicates that the task execution was canceled.
member.param: The reason that describes the result.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerExecutionInfo
member.summary: Provides information about the execution of a taskbox instance.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerExecutionInfo.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the parent taskbox instance identifier.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerExecutionInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo
member.summary: Provides information about a taskbox instance worker.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the taskbox worker identifier.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo.State
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of the taskbox worker.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo.StateReason
member.summary: Gets or sets the reason associated with the taskbox worker state.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo.CreatedOn
member.summary: Gets or sets the moment when the taskbox worker was created.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo.ModifiedOn
member.summary: Gets or sets the moment when the taskbox worker was last modified.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo.TimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to live of the taskbox worker (in seconds).

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo.Execution
member.summary: Gets or sets information about the taskbox worker execution.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerInfo.AddError(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified error.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerState
member.summary: Defines the state of a taskbox worker.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerState.Started
member.summary: The taskbox worker is started.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerState.Waiting
member.summary: The taskbox worker is waiting for a task to execute.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerState.Executing
member.summary: The taskbox worker is executing a task.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerState.Failed
member.summary: The taskbox worker has failed.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Taskbox.WorkerState.Stopped
member.summary: The taskbox worker is stopped.
